Summary: Large object maybe a plane flying low lights all around front
divs: Sighting DetailsThe last several nights I have seen several objects in the sky. Very far away but extremely bright fast blinking lights changing colors appears to skip across the sky. I saw several, about 4 come together over Route 42 AC expressway. Then A low flying aircraft flew above the tree line over my house, I couldn't make out the exact shape but the front was in a V shape with lights across it. I didn't hear much sound. It then flew and joined the other objects in the sky. The next night I went outside and saw 2 objects in the same spot as the night before but hovering lower to the ground and closer in distance to me. Ever since I have been scared and can't sleep. Please check this out.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gloucester Township
There were no other sightings in Gloucester Township on or around January 29th 2008
